message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a one-time price of $18000. It's a rare opportunity to own something truly unique, and I'm confident you'll love it.

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $14000?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $16000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product, which is the highest price I'm comfortable with. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I believe the product's value is worth more than your last offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $16500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I'm confident you'll find it's a fair deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering $15750. This is the highest price I'm willing to pay, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
